BG3 Sylvan Scimitar Information

Melee Caster: Instead of its Dexterity Modifier, the affected entity add its Spellcasring Ability Modifier to Attack Rolls. Range: 1.5m

BG3 Sylvan Scimitar Location & Where to Find

Location: On Jaheira.

Sylvan Scimitar Notes & Tips for BG3

Rarity: Uncommon Value: 65 Gp. Weight: 1.35 Kg.
